review: This is a clever,  easy to use device that allows me to enjoy my prime movies and TV shows  on my ld tv .  Thank you,  who ever made this beauty
author: Linda S. Cosma

review: The stick works great and was easy to set up. It came in at a reasonable time. The packaging was fine and so was the price. It seems like it would be way better if I had a prime account, about the only benefit is using sling TV though I do have to pay for it each month just like all the other apps on the stick, I already have a Google TV with access to the internet.
author: savsan4

review: It's unable to add Vudu app which is very disappointing.
author: Mary Queen-Rogers

review: This item does everything it is supposed to do, had an easy setup process, is extremely user friendly, and works flawlessly! Needless to say it is my new obsession!!
author: Ray

review: Great piece of gear and reliable.
author: Matthew Olson

review: Great product , easy to set up and easy to use .
author: Johnny Bravo

review: It's ok.  Comcast is not on the list as a supported cable co for some apps. I do like that i can now stream Netflix on another tv... it is cool to have so many choices for something to watch.
author: Sarah

review: Locks up while using YouTube and locks up navigating other apps sometimes requiring returning to the home screen and starting over.Prime music isn't really user friendly on this device and does not allow any type of search for music only a browse of playlist or music that has been added by a different device.
author: 812b4
